title: Rapha MTB tease sneak preview of Performance Trailwear due in June 2021
content:
A new Instagram page, Rapha MTB, has released some teaser footage of their new Performance Trailwear line for men and women, due for release in June 2021. This is pretty big news for the ultra high-end cycling apparel brand that has traditionally focused their attention on the road. We can’t say too much about it […]

The post Rapha MTB tease sneak preview of Performance Trailwear due in June 2021 appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
